name: Klang 2 Demo
description:
The blind and disgraced rhythm-warrior Klang gets a second shot at life when he's "blessed" with a new pair of eyes by his former enemy: The otherworldly, all-seeing deity, A-Eye. Sharing the desire for revenge against Soundlord Sonus, they form an uneasy alliance to accomplish their mutual goal. 

FULL GAME AVAILABLE NOW ON STEAM!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1111600/Klang_2/

COMING "VERY" SOON TO SWITCH, XBOX ONE & SERIES X|S, PS4 & PS5!

SUPPORT THE COMPOSERS!
https://blindedm.com/klang-game

CONTROLS
Mouse & Keyboard:
Point and click, WASD can be used for dashing.
Esc/Backspace/Middle mouse button to pause game.

Gamepad:
Aim from Klang's position with left stick, attack with left mouse button

CREDITS
Created by: Tinimations
Lead audio: bLiNd
Guest artists for the demo: City Girl, James Landino, Steven Silo

Features of the full version of Klang 2:

  • 30 levels of intense EDM-Action. Playable at both normal and fast speed for extra challenge.
  • Semi-procedural combat system ensuring the same track never plays exactly the same.
  • Several boss types gradually changing the rules of engagement.
  • Music by the legendary composer bLiNd, and other talented artists such as James Landino, Arcien, Nhato, Steven Silo, City Girl, cYsmix and more!
  • Techno-greek aesthetic is inspired by synthwave, musical symbolism and greek sculpture.
  • Playable with numerous control inputs such as: Mouse, gamepad, drawing tablet and touch.
